item.title: What Drove Israel’s Attack on Hamas in Qatar?

item.title: UK Ambassador to the U.S., Peter Mandelson, Forced Out Over Epstein Links
item.description: The British government said it had withdrawn the envoy after newly revealed emails showed the depth of his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: South Korean Leader Warns of U.S. Investments After Hyundai-LG Plant Raid
item.description: President Lee Jae Myung made the comments as hundreds of South Korean workers swept in an immigration raid were expected to fly home on Thursday.

item.title: Nepal’s Young Protesters Find an Unlikely Partner: The Army
item.description: After an explosion of popular rage tore through the country, its respected army was the only institution left standing. It’s now in talks with the pro...

item.title: Drone Barrage Over Poland Was a Test for NATO, and the U.S.
item.description: A continent already on edge over the Ukraine war sees a Russian challenge to NATO readiness and to an America that wants to disengage from Europe.
